body.name: Vapor Fitness Phone Holder Made for PM5 Monitors of Concept 2 Rower, SkiErg and BikeErg - Silicone Smartphone Cradle Compatible with Concept 2 Rowing Machine. Ideal Rower Accessories
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 18 mins
features: Improved Design for PM5 Monitors: The ribs in the phone holder are designed to support the phone and prevent the power and volume buttons from being pressed. This is the product that’s been missing from your workout! Make your workouts more enjoyable by watching videos on your smartphone while you row, bike or ski! This product is compatible with the Concept 2 Rowing Machine, SkiErg and BikeErg PM5 monitors.

Fits Most Smartphones: The phone holder is made of silicone. Fits even the largest smartphones with protective cases. The cradle can be stretched 4" to fit most devices. Extra large phones might not fit with a thick phone case. It will also fit smaller smartphones.

Easy to Use: Flexible hook-like shape allows for tight hold of most smartphones. The product measures 5" x 3.75" x 2.75" and has a built in bridge to prevent the buttons from being pressed down. There’s no need to remove your protective case before using.

Patent Pending Design: The silicone smartphone holder slides on top of the compatible Concept2 PM5 monitor and fits snugly. It is reinforced at the back with a third rib for stability. This product comes in black, neon yellow, pink, khaki green or red and is made of high quality silicone.

Compatibility: Our phone mount compatible for the PM5 monitor from Concept 2. It will NOT fit on PM3 and PM4 monitors. It slides in easily, making it the perfect product to bring to the gym or use at home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making Your Workouts More Enjoyable! With the Vapor Fitness Phone Holder for the Concept 2 PM5 model, you can enhance your workout by attaching your smartphone just above the monitor for perfect viewing. Watch anything from tutorials to get inspired, music videos to keep you motivated or your favorite guilty pleasure! Get Vapor Fit with the newest addition to the VF collection!

Why is Silicone the Best Choice for Our Phone Holder? Durable Material Silicone is highly durable and retains its shape and flexibility in extreme conditions, making it a particularly reliable material for use in critical applications. Recyclable Can be recycled multiple times without losing much of its structural integrity. A great plastic alternative! Easy to Clean Made of food grade silicone, it can withstand high temperatures making it easy to wipe down and clean. Get away yucky germs! Flexible and Secure Ability to stretch or bend to be compatible with other products and have a grip to hold securely in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My rower has a clamp that would work for the phone, but I use that for my Kindle Fire to watch Arrested Development on Netflix. (Gotta be entertained) My phone is synced with my smart watch and I use that to monitor heart rateIt fit my iPhone 8 nicely and doesnt wiggle around enough to be bothersome. It’s one of those things that’s nice to have, even if not absolutely necessary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone holder - secure and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: My only issue is the price - for a piece of rubber it seems excessive. However, it is well made and sits firmly on the PM5. It also holds the phone very securely and it can be a bit difficult go get the phone into the holder since it's very tight. I have a Pixel 8 Pro and while it fits it can be a bit difficult. Overall this is exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior to the standard holder
reviews.reviewText: This is great. It’s a flexible holder that securely holds your phone in place while you row. I’ve used it for two years without issue, and it should last ten years or more.It’s so much better than the clumsy phone holder that comes with the Concept 2 rower. You’d think for the price of the rower, they could include something better than a piece of rigid plastic that requires forcefully wedging your phone in place. (I was scared my phone would slip out and be flung across the room.)This holder is much nicer. It is a soft silicone that hits the right balance of flexible but secure. It fits my iPhone SE (2020 edition, so like an iPhone 8 size) and my wife’s slightly larger iPhone 11 without issue. The top and bottom each have a lip that latches onto your phone and the grippy silicone ensures your phone never slides left to right.You have to be careful that the mount is not pressing the buttons on the side of your phone, but there are sort of notches or spaces on in bottom part of holder to make this easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Good product. Can be difficult to get your phone into but it holds your phone secure during a row. I’ll take the security

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Such a simple idea and it's absolutely genius. The plastic piece is hollow at the base so it slips over the top of the rower's monitor - perfect positioning to allow you to watch both the monitor and the phone screen. The fit is secure, both the holder to the monitor and where you clip a phone into the holder. Easy to "install" and to put the phone in/take it out. In terms of the size of phones it works with, after this arrived we got new phones and found the holder works with both a Galaxy S9 and a larger Galaxy S21+. Every product should be this perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well with Google Pixel 8 pro

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for what it is
reviews.reviewText: Holds my phone just like it promised. Solid and durable quality. Fits just perfectly on the rower too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this little holder! It holds my giant Samsung Note 10 easily and without issue. It was simple to put on, of course, and stays put. It is a clean look, doesn't make it overly complicated, doesn't leave marks and can't really cause scratches or damage of any sort.The holder that came with the machine actually sucks a lot, I couldn't get my phone positioned right and I ended up looking down more than up, and that's not the goal, having the phone up higher is a much better position. Also, I feel that the one that came with the machine will scratch the machine in the long run, this one won't.10/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Buenisimo, funciona excelente para mantener el telefono encima del PM5
reviews.reviewText: Muy bien hecho y de muy buen material, se adapta perfecto encima del PM5 y matiene mi telefono al alcance mientras uso la app de C2
Fits great on the PM5 monitor and holds my iPhone 12 max just fine. Perfect!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Fits like a glove and works well
reviews.reviewText: The Phone Holder Made for PM5 Monitors has become an indispensable companion during my rowing sessions. It effortlessly secures my phone, providing stability even in the midst of a rowing frenzy.Its perfect fit feels so OEM that I once forgot to remove it from the gym rowing machine, and it was still there two days later. The holder not only enhances my rowing experience but also seamlessly integrates into the equipment.This accessory allows me to use live apps for racing, adding a competitive edge to my workouts. I can confidently say I love this holder and never embark on a rowing session without it. 🚣‍♂️📱💙
Mi hijo odia hacer el ergometro pero con esto puede controlar su música o mirar una programa.
Aussparung an den Rändern verhindern versehentliche Betätigung der Funktionstasten, Position angenhm, sehr einfache Montage am C2 und vom Tele am C2. In Kombi mit Sitzauflage richtig cool.
